name: Beefcake's Burger Factory
text:
Stack It Up
Dressed with American cheese, caramelized onions, lettuce, tomato, pickles, signature sauce, and smokey bacon.
Stacked Single - $10.25
Stacked Double - $12.40
Stacked Triple - $14.50
The Bull (four) - $17.95
Reliable Classics
Dressed with ketchup, mustard, diced onions and pickles.
Classic Burger/Cheeseburger - $5.40/$6.00
Classic Hot Dog - $5.95
Factory Signatures
Dressed with caramelized onions, signature sauce, pickles, and lettuce.
Signature Burger - $6.95
Signature Cheeseburger - $7.50
Daddy's Recipes
The Westfort: BBQ sauce, fried onion ring, double cheddar, lettuce, tomato, bacon, corn relish. Single - $9.65 / Double - $12.75
Bacon & Blue Cheese: Lettuce, tomato, Swiss and blue cheese and pickled onion. $8.95
Triple Grilled Cheese Mac: Two patties, three grilled cheese sammys, lettuce, pickles, onions, special sauce. $15.25
That Canadian: Beef patty, smoked pork tenderloin, maple syrup, lettuce, tomato, smokey pepper mayo, crispy onions. Single - $10.00 / Double - $13.25
Swiss Mushroom: Extra Swiss cheese, caramelized onion & beef gravy. $8.30
Jalapeno Cheddar: Double cheddar, lettuce, tomato, pickled jalapenos, and mayo. $8.50
Cheddar Chippotie Daddy Hot Dog: Cheddar, chipotle sauce, caramelized onions, signature sauce, bacon, crispy onions. $8.05
Jim Jam: Peanut butter, goat cheese, raspberry and sour cherry jam, blueberry heartbeat. $9.95
I Got No Beef Witchu
O.G. Bean & Oat Veggie: Lettuce, tomato, and signature sauce. $8.25
Yam, & Risotto Veggie: Lettuce, tomato, onion, & maple syrup. $9.00
O.G. Big Bird Chicken: Lettuce, tomato, and sig sauce. $9.75
Spicy Buffalo Chicken: Lettuce, tomato, buffalo sauce, and ranch or blue cheese. $9.95
Chicken Caesar Sandwich: Lettuce, tomato, Swiss, asiago, Parmesan, bacon, and rst garlic caesar dressing. $10.35
Try any Beefcake's burger as a full flavour gluten free burger bowl, no bun, extra toppings!
It Ain't Easy Bein' This Cheesy
Buffalo Chicken Grilled Cheese: Buttermilk fried chicken, cheddar, buffalo sauce with ranch or blue cheese. $9.25
Jalapeno Popper Grilled Cheese: Fried jalapenos, bacon, cheddar, & heartbeat jalapeno cream cheese. $8.65
Home Alone Grilled Cheese: Texas toast, American cheddar, smokey bacon, and classic cheddar. $7.50
Kids Stuff - Kids under 15 served with a half order of fries and a drink
Kids Hot Dog - $7.50
Kids Classic Burger/Cheeseburger - $8.05 / $8.50
Kids Grilled Cheese - $8.00
Kids Chicken Strips - $8.75
Makin' Friends With Salads
House Greens: Mixed greens, tomato, cucumber, pickled onions, pepperocini, choice dressing. $7.50 / $14.25
Greek Salad: Romaine, olives, tomatoes, cucumber, feta, herb vinaigrette. $7.95 / $14.95
Caesar Salad: Romaine, croutons, bacon, Parmesan, asiago, roasted garlic dressing. $7.95 / $14.95
Combos - Available with the purchase of any burger or sandwich
Fries + Drink - $5.85
Salad + Drink - $8.75
Poutine + Drink - $9.00
Sides/Addons
Fries - $5.25
Poutine - $8.25 / $14.25
Gravy - $1.90
Braised Beef Poutine - $12.25 / $20.00
Beef N' Cheese Taquitos - $12.00
Deep Fried Pickles - $8.70
Onion Rings - $9.95
House Breaded Mozza Logs - $10.25 (Marinara - +$1.50)
